trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were no other sightings in Toronto on or around June 24th 2010
Summary: White light ball travelled at great speed.
divs: Sighting DetailsStanding by the window for a min or two , than my eyes went to the eastern direction & at that moment I saw , out of a thin air , a white light ball manifested itself traveling in a straight line at great speed from East to West direction (their usual flight pattern) above the lake & than once in the west it just disappeared without any flush . Seemed they were in big hurry this time . To the question #2 & #5 , I was expecting to see them as I had no reason to go to look out the window & actually was about to leave home , I always feel happy to see them . Someone wrote a report re: a dream of the ETs , don't worry , that is one way how they communicate , good that you have a clear mind & heart . And yes they do at times have some difficulty manouver the ships in our atmosphere . A year ago I too had a simmilar dream & in it they travelled in front of my building towards Eastern direction & about an hour later after awaking it was in the news UFO crashed in the Ottawa river.
